entries.description: StepFunctions: allow state machines with non-object values for Parameters property
Fix incorrect use of Markdown in new SAM application READMEs
Fix: syntax support (JSON schemas) for CloudFormation/SAM yaml sometimes doesn't work
Credential profiles that do not require user-input now correctly refresh when expired
"Upload Lambda" from any folder in VS Code File Explorer
"Send Feedback" form always enables Send button and doesn't require text input
SAM: create, run and debug nodejs16.x Lambdas
CDK features are now found in the _Developer Tools_ view. This view will contain more ways to work with local project resources in future releases.
